error_when_creating_mint_quote_for_mint: Error when creating mint quote for mint: {mintUrl}
error_when_creating_melt_quote_for_mint: Error when creating melt quote for mint: {mintUrl}
creating_melt_quote_error: Error when creating melt quote for {mintUrl}
cannot_get_fee_for_unknown_mint: Cannot get fee for unknown mint
nostr_address_description: Your nostr address is used to send and receive messages over nostr.
enter_npub_to_import_contact_list_from_n: Enter NPUB to import contact list from Nostr
load_any_follow_list_from_nostr: Load any follow list from Nostr
deleted_wallet_reloading: Wallet has been deleted. Reloading now
restart_failed: Restart has failed. Please restart the app manually.
these_actions_cannot_be_undone: These actions can not be undone. Be sure of what you want to do before proceeding.
are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_all_data: Are you sure you want to delete all data?
your_wallet_will_be_gone: This cannot be undone. Your wallet will be gone forever.
manipulating_counters_can_mess_up_restor: Manipulating counters can mess up the restore process. Only proceed if you know what you are doing.
thank_you_for_using_nutstash: Thank you for using nutstash, an open source Cashu wallet
consider_showing_appreciation: If you like using nutstash, consider showing your appreciation by sharing some nuts with the wallet devs.
you_are_about_to_donate: You are about to donate {amount} to nutstash
you_can_add_npubs_names_or_anything: You can add NPUBs, names, or anything else that should be credited in the donation note.
swap_invoice_could_not_be_paid: Swap invoice could not be paid. Try again later.
beta_warning: Nutstash is still in beta development. Please use at own risk.
nutstash_is_a: Nutstash is a Cashu ecash wallet.
ecash_works_without_accounts: Ecash works without accounts. Cashu tokens are bearer assets, that are stored locally on your nutstash wallet.
nutstash_is_not_the_custodian: Nutstash is NOT the custodian. The custodian of your sats are the mints you choose to connect to.
looks_like_your_wallet_is_updating_old: Looks like you were using an older nutstash version. In order to keep using nutstash, we need to migrate your wallet. We've already exported a backup for you, so go ahead whenever you feel ready.
only_ecash_and_mints_migrate: Only ecash and mints will be migrated.
if_you_have_no_backup: If you have no cashu seed phrase or nutstash backup file, select this option.
recover_ecash_from: Recover ecash from a lost wallet with your seed phrase.
select_this_to_restore_wallet: Select this option to recreate a lost wallet.
import_a_nutstash_wallet_file: Load a wallet from a backup file.
select_this_option_if_you_have_exported: Select this option if you have exported a nutstash wallet and want to import it.
drop_or_select_backup: Drop the nutstash_backup.json file here, or click to select a file
backup_file_legacy_wallet: This backup is from a legacy wallet
only_mints_will_be_imported: Only mints and tokens will be imported.
wallet_backup_protected: This wallet backup has been protected with a passphrase.
enter_passphrase_to_decrypt_file: Enter the passphrase to decrypt and restore from this wallet file.
the_seed_phrase_must_be_12_words_long: The seed phrase must be 12 words long.
seed_phrase_invalid: Invalid seed phrase. Please try again.
restore_ecash_from_seed_phrase: Restore ecash from a seed phrase
enter_your_seed_phrase_correct_order: Enter your seed phrase in the correct order.
keep_nuts_safe: Set up wallet encryption to keep your nuts safe.
write_down_your_12_words: Write down your 12 words and store them securely.
added_restored_ecash_to_your_wallet: Added restored ecash to your wallet.
adding_will_replace_ecash: Adding the restored ecash will replace all ecash in the wallet. Only proceed if you are sure of what you are doing.
choose_a_passphrase_to_encrypt_file: Choose a passphrase to encrypt the export file with.
experimental_nwc_integrations: Experimental NWC integration. It only works if nutstash is running in the foreground.
are_you_sure_you_want_to_remove_connecti: Are you sure you want to disconnect and remove this connection?
connected_services_will_no_longer_be_abl: Connected services will no longer be able to access this wallet.
this_connection_will_be_able_to_access_f: This connection will be able to access funds from your wallet, up to the amount set as the allowance.
check_if_ecash_has_been_claimed: Check if ecash has been claimed.
unclaimed_ecash_will_be_added_back: Un-claimed ecash will get added back to the wallet.
warning_you_should_only_check_active_pro: Warning! You should only check active proofs if the wallet state got messed up.
are_you_sure_remove_passphrase: Are you sure you want to remove your passphrase?
this_will_leave_wallet_unencrypted: This will leave wallet unencrypted and vulnerable to theft.
keys_that_are_added_manually_not_restore: Keys that are added manually cannot be restored from the seed phrase.
keys_are_used_to_unlock_locked_ecash_tok: Keys are used to unlock locked ecash tokens. The pubkey that is used for locking will be revealed to the mint when the ecash is unlocked.
it_is_advised_not_to_reuse_keys_to_prese: It is advised to not reuse keys to preserve unlinkability of transactions.
no_payment_request_to_send: No payment request to send to
no_matching_truested_mint_for_request: No matching trusted mint for this request
can_be_received_offline_without_trusting: Can be received offline without trusting the sender
offline_receiving_requires_trusting_the_: Offline receiving requires trusting the sender
dont_forget_to_claim_it_when_youre_onlin: don't forget to claim it when you're online!
no_key_found_in_wallet_for_lock: No key found in wallet for lock
sure_delete_token: Are you sure you want to delete this token?
cannot_be_undone_delete_token: This cannot be undone. The token will be gone forever.
scan_a_X_qr: Scan a {type} QR code to continue
you_can_scan_cashu_bla_bla: You can scan a cashu token, a lightning address or invoice, a pubkey and more!
approach_nfc_tag_to_read_it: Approach NFC tag to read it
scanned_tag_was_not_cashu_token: Scanned tag was not a Cashu token
scanned_non_cashu_token: Scanned tag was not a cashu token:
approach_nfc_tag_to_write: Approach NFC tag to write the token to it
token_has_been_written_to_nfc_tag: Token has been written to NFC tag
paste_invoice_to_send_via_lightning: Paste invoice to send via lightning
to_use_the_wallet_add_mint: To use the wallet, add a mint.
no_known_action_for_pasted: No known action available for pasted informaion
